articles.title: Vladimir Putin warns against phasing out Russian gas - The Indian Express
articles.description: The European Union is dependent on Russia for 40% of its natural gas and 25% of its oil.

articles.title: Worldwide COVID-19 cases surpass 500 million as Omicron subvariant BA.2 surges - CBC News
articles.description: Global COVID-19 cases surpassed 500 million on Thursday, according to a Reuters tally, as the highly contagious BA.2 sub-variant of Omicron surges in many countries in Europe and Asia.
articles.content:

articles.title: Webb space telescope cools to 6K to tackle dark current eeNews Europe - eeNews Europe
articles.description: The Mid-Infrared Instrument (MIRI) on the James Webb space telescope has dropped to 6.4 K to tackle dark currents in the sensor.

articles.author: Press Association
articles.title: Taoiseach warns business leaders that Ireland faces moment of ‘great crisis’ - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: Micheál Martin said Russia’s war has created challenges across the European Union.
articles.content:
The Taoiseach has warned business leaders that Ireland and the world is facing a moment of great crisis and unpredictability over the war in Ukraine.

articles.title: Villarreal's Champions League run continues as Bayern Munich waste key chances - ESPN
articles.description: The "Yellow Submarine" has claimed another of Europe's elite sides as Villarreal continue their run and make Bayern rue some missed opportunities.
